scripts.optimize:icons:jpeg: mkdir -p public/icons_jpeg_tmp && for f in public/icons_png_backup/*.jpg; do out="public/icons_jpeg_tmp/$(basename "$f")"; sips -s format jpeg -s formatOptions 90 "$f" --out "$out" >/dev/null; done && rm -f public/icons/*.jpg && mv public/icons_jpeg_tmp/*.jpg public/icons/ && rmdir public/icons_jpeg_tmp
